Moves - 16.09.10 | News | New Media Age

Posted by Sean on September 16, 2010

The __2View Group_, owner of 21 online city guides, has hired _Sean Reilly __as marketing manager. He was previously marketing consultant for 3 network website dealson3.co.uk

[Moves - 16.09.10 News New Media Age](http://www.nma.co.uk/news/people-moves/moves-160910/3018195.article).
